property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Count the number of your Gods in the battle zone. For each of your Gods, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Then, look at all of your shields. You may put any number of Gods from among them into the battle zone.

card.name: Grave Deal, Shadow of Pure Flame

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. If you have a God in your mana zone, that creature gets -4000 power until the end of the turn. If you don't have a God in your mana zone, that creature gets -2000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may un-link one of your linked God in the battle zone that has the names Zen, Transcendent God and Aku, Ultimate God. If you do, search your deck. You may choose a card from it that has the name Violence Heaven, God Bringer, or God Saga. Shuffle your deck. Then you may cast the chosen spell for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature would leave the battle zone, if you have a God in the battle zone, it stays in the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put a God that costs 7 or less from your graveyard or mana zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever one of your Gods in the battle zone would be destroyed, you may return it to your hand instead. ■ God Link (Zen, Transcendent God) Left Side ■ Whenever this creature attacks while linked, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {SYMPATHY}: Earth Eater and Giant (This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your Earth Eater, Giant in play. It can't cost less than 2.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your Earth Eaters in the battle zone. Then you may draw a card for each of your Giants in the battle zone. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This spell costs up to 3 less to summon for each of your linked Gods in the battle zone. It can't cost less than 1. ■ Destroy all creatures except Gods.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each race you have in the battle zone other than Mystery Totem.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Choose a non-evolution creature in the battle zone and add it to its owner's shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ God Link (Aku, Ultimate God) Right Side {GOD LINK} (If you have the specified God in the battle zone, you may link it to this card. The linked God has the characteristics of each God (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When it would leave the battle zone, choose either card.) ■ While this creature is linked, it has "quattro breaker" and untaps at the end of each of your turns. (A creature that has "quattro breaker" breaks 4 shields.)

card.name: Chief De Baula, Machine King of Mystic Light

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Amaterasu, Founder of the Blue Wolves

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of the following: ► Search your deck. Choose a spell that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then cast that spell for no cost: ► Search your deck. Choose a cross gear that costs 4 or less from it and shuffle your deck. Then generate that cross gear for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose a civilization. You may put one of your creatures that has the chosen civilization from the battle zone into your mana zone. If you do, choose a creature in your mana zone that has the same civilization as the chosen creature that costs the same as or less than than the number of cards in your mana zone and put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each civilization in your mana zone, you may look at a card from the top of your deck. Put one of them into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.
